item.title: Antras postas
item.description: This is the second post. css CSS code snippet pre { background: #1a1a1d; padding: 20px; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 1rem; overflow: auto; @media (--phone) { white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; } code { background: none !important; color: #ccc; padding: 0; font-size: inherit; } }
item.content:
This is the second post. 


pre {
  background: #1a1a1d;
  padding: 20px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  overflow: auto;

  @media (--phone) {
    white-space: pre-wrap;
    word-wrap: break-word;
  }

  code {
    background: none !important;
    color: #ccc;
    padding: 0;
    font-size: inherit;
  }
}
